content.rendered:
Protecting Your Loved Ones and Your Legacy.

At William J Kramer, L.L.C., we combine experience and a strong commitment to offering a personal approach to estate planning and estate administration. We believe that one size never fits all when it comes to estate planning. For that reason, attorney William J. Kramer works with you to create and implement an estate plans that incorporates your unique estate planning goals to provide you with peace of mind.

Whether you need assistance with setting up a revocable trust, naming guardians for your minor children or navigating the passing of a loved one, Joel’s focus is putting you at ease with practical advice and responsive counsel.  Contact William J Kramer, L.L.C. for a complimentary consultation to discuss how our firm can help you protect your loved ones and your legacy with effective planning.

  • Estate Planning with Wills & Living Trusts
  • Incapacity Planning
  • Family Cabin Trusts
  • Planning for Charitable Giving
  • Asset Protection Planning
  • Estate Planning for Blended Families
  • Probate & Trust Administration
  • Planning for Minor Children & Young Adult Children
  • Special & Supplemental Needs Planning
  • Advanced Estate Planning
